introduction:
=== Welcome to DataShell ===
Type 'exit' to quit
---------------------------

alias.gen:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS alias (
    name TEXT PRIMARY KEY,
    cmd TEXT,
    type TEXT,
    isordered INTEGER,
    isiterate INTEGER, 
    syscmd INTEGER);
alias.select: SELECT * FROM alias WHERE name LIKE ? || '%';
alias.insert: INSERT OR REPLACE INTO alias (name, cmd, type, isordered, isiterate, syscmd) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);

alias.err:
[ERROR] Invalid alias format.
[USAGE] alias <name>=<command>
Hint: alias must be a single argument, e.g. alias bio='set bio'
Type 'help alias' for more information.
alias.success: [OK] Alias have been added successfully. '{}' â†’ '{}'

unalias.err:
[ERROR] Invalid unalias format.
[USAGE] unalias <name>
Hint: you must supply the alias name to remove.
Type 'help unalias' for more information.
